description.value:
Wardens connect with the natural world in a variety of ways to augment their fighting abilities. Choose one of the following options.

@UUID[Compendium.dnd-4e-compendium.module-features.bRFWeJMs4hExzVa8]{Earthstrength}@UUID[Compendium.dnd-4e-compendium.module-features.lm7sbChZi63zTgw1]{Lifespirit}@UUID[Compendium.dnd-4e-compendium.module-features.CEclsAxDt2FyQpzS]{Stormheart}@UUID[Compendium.dnd-4e-compendium.module-features.BMj0J9xpyCDGKWN8]{Wildblood}
